name: Vertical Force Coordination
description: After an opposing character takes Overloaded reaction DMG: Create 1 Overcharged Ball card in your hand (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character takes Overloaded reaction DMG:</color> Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113131]</color> card in your hand (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character takes Overloaded reaction DMG:</color> Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Overcharged Ball</color> card in your hand (Once per Round)
